## 10DOF Sensor
Bought at DealExtreme

* L3GD20H 3-axis gyroscope: ±250, ±500, or ±2000 degree-per-second scale
* LSM303 3-axis compass: ±1.3 to ±8.1 gauss magnetic field scale
* LSM303 3-axis accelerometer: ±2g/±4g/±8g/±16g selectable scale
* BMP180 barometric pressure/temperature: -40 to 85 °C, 300 - 1100hPa range, 0.17m
* BMP180 Barometric Pressure Sensor

### Datasheet
```
I2C Addresses
0x19     LSM303 Accelerometer
0x1E     LSM303 Compass
0x6B    L3GD20H 3-axis gyroscope
0x77    BMP180  Barometric Pressure Sensor
```
